oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lavinia Hilliard Shute
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Small carte de visite of Lavinia "Venie" Hilliard Shute. Written on the back of the card is "Mrs William D Shute, mother of 9, only 4 lived, Margaret Shute, Leila Shute, Kate Shute, Venie Shute"

Lavinia Lafayette Hilliard (1837-1872) married William Dickson Shute (1834-1916) in 1856. William's father, Lee Shute, sold the Grassmere property to his son for $5 in 1859 on occasion of his marriage to Lavinia. The Shutes had nine children together, but only four of them survived to adulthood: Margaret Shute, Leila Shute Tigert, Kate Shute Croft, and Lavinia Shute Hotchkiss.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Women--Tennessee; Carte de visite photographs
Portraits; Portrait photographs
